title: There's a delightfully annoying Easter egg in the new Call of Duty gun
text: latest Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III And warzone The bundle includes an SMG that includes a silly animation that references the annoying “update requires restart” message commonly encountered by players when attempting to boot up any game. Just be prepared to spend $20 to get this new gun. This Modern Warfare 3 gameplay feature promotes a weak campaign Duty Games released over the years have frustrated fans by asking them to restart the game due to updates. This message often appears before going to the main menu. While on console this restart may only take a few seconds, PC players may have to wait a minute or more before they can begin playing. this has been a problem at least since 2020 and there's still one thing MWII and battle royale spin-offs warzone, This message has become so ubiquitous over the years that it's become a meme cod community. And Activision is even willing to laugh at itself while taking some money from you. On January 5, the “Insert Coin Mastercraft” cosmetic bundle was revealed MW III And warzoneIn-game stores. While the bundle includes a range of cosmetics – including a new 80s-themed outfit, loading screen, and player emblem – the arcade rhythm submachine gun is the best part of this expensive pack. This is because if you inspect the weapon, your soldier will attempt to log the SMG by bringing it to their face. Duty By mashing a button, and then being greeted with the annoying update prompt. This leads to the soldier banging his gun in frustration, which is probably copied by countless others. cod Players have reacted to the gesture. I am not Duty These days, the players still aren't, but I will admit that it's nice to see this franchise, which is usually very serious, make fun of itself. Additionally, the arcade rhythm SMG comes with a neat pixel-death effect that basically de-rays everyone you kill, tron Style. And it also includes pixelated muzzle smoke, which is a nice touch. once again Duty Keeps me tempted by cool retro video game skins and weapons Apocalypse Gun from last year.
